headline: Intuitive Surgical, Inc. (ISRG) Unveils AI-Powered da Vinci 5 Upgrades
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 12 Best Healthcare Stocks to Buy and Hold for 5 Years. Intuitive Surgical, Inc. is one of them. Intuitive Surgical, Inc. (NASDAQ:ISRG) has pioneered robotic-assisted minimally invasive surgery (MIS), with its da Vinci systems now used in millions of procedures and training tens of thousands of surgeons globally. […]

headline: SS Innovations International, Inc. (SSII)’s SSi Mantra System Sees 130% Installation Growth, Pioneers Cardiac Telesurgery

(NASDAQ:SSII) is advancing affordable surgical robotics with its flagship SSi Mantra system, offering a cost-efficient alternative to established platforms like Intuitive Surgical’s da Vinci. headline: ISRG Expands SP Indications: A Game Changer in Colorectal Surgery?
summary: Intuitive Surgical's SP platform secures new colorectal clearances, with 88% growth in procedures and rising global adoption momentum.
